title: Handle a Customer Payment Dispute
description: A customer claims they already paid an invoice that is showing as overdue.

tasks.description: Retrieve the disputed invoice and the customer's payment history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the invoice and payment records.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for proof of payment, such as a check number or transaction ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer provides a check number.

tasks.description: Search the bank records for the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the check payment was received but was mistakenly applied to the wrong customer account.

tasks.description: Correct the payment application, moving the payment to the correct account and closing the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent corrects the error and resolves the dispute.
